mapper.select: SELECT ITEM.ITEM_CODE ,ITEM_NAME ,ITEM_PRICE ,ATTACHED_NAME FROM SHOP_ITEM ITEM,ITEM_IMG IMG WHERE ITEM.ITEM_CODE=IMG.ITEM_CODE AND IS_MAIN='Y' ORDER BY ITEM.ITEM_CODE DESC

SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , MEMBER_ID , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , REG_DATE , ITEM_COMMENT , ITEM_STATUS , TRADE_TYPE , TRADE_ADDR , ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN FROM SHOP_ITEM S, ITEM_IMG I WHERE I.ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} AND S.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE

SELECT I.ITEM_CODE , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE , ATTACHED_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(WISH_CODE) FROM WISH_LIST WHERE ITEM_CODE = S.ITEM_CODE) AS CNT_WISH_LIST FROM SHOP_ITEM S, ITEM_IMG I, WISH_LIST W WHERE S.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE AND S.ITEM_CODE = W.ITEM_CODE(+) AND S.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND IS_MAIN = 'Y' ORDER BY ITEM_CODE DESC
